analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/45/0x67e444c4c8030ba3d6d85dc1cf16f3ee79f22af2.sol:
	Contract MoonToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/45/0x67e444c4c8030ba3d6d85dc1cf16f3ee79f22af2.sol#224)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/45/0x67e444c4c8030ba3d6d85dc1cf16f3ee79f22af2.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/45/0x67e444c4c8030ba3d6d85dc1cf16f3ee79f22af2.sol#5-7): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/45/0x67e444c4c8030ba3d6d85dc1cf16f3ee79f22af2.sol#94) is not in mixedCase
